螞蚱也是肉.definition: lit. even a locust provides some nourishment (idiom); fig. it's better than nothing

螞蜂.definition: variant of 馬蜂|马蜂[ma3 feng1]

螞蟻上樹.definition: "ants climbing a tree", a Sichuan dish made with cellophane noodles 粉絲|粉丝[fen3 si1] and ground meat (so called because the particles of meat clinging to the noodles look like ants on the twigs of a tree); (sex position) man standing, woman clinging to his upper body; (erotic massage) full-body licking

螞蟻包.definition: ant bite (swollen, itchy bump); anthill; ant mound; (metonym) ant nest

螞蟻金服.definition: Ant Financial Services Group, an affiliate company of Alibaba 阿里巴巴[A1 li3 ba1 ba1]
